name: ReferralForTobaccoCessationCounseling
title: Referral for Tobacco Cessation Counseling
purpose:
(Clinical Focus: This set of values is composed of codes which identify a patient has received a referral to some sort of tobacco cessation counseling, such as a stop-smoking clinic.),(Data Element Scope: The intent of this data element is to identify communication from provider to provider that a referral to a tobacco cessation counseling has been performed.  Using the Quality Data Model, this data element maps to Communication from Provider to Provider.),(Inclusion Criteria: Appointment made with providers of proactive telephone counseling, group counseling, individual counseling, or e-health and internet intervention.
Referral to Quitline.),(Exclusion Criteria: Referral information given to the patient without an appointment made prior to discharge.)
